me.kiip.sdk
Class Poptart

java.lang.Object
  me.kiip.sdk.Poptart
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.DialogInterface
public abstract class Poptart
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.content.DialogInterface

A unit compromising of a Notification and a Modal. If the notification is null, the unit will go straight to full screen.

Author:
Grantland Chew

setOnShowListener

public abstract void setOnShowListener(android.content.DialogInterface.OnShowListener listener)
Sets a listener to be invoked when the Poptart is shown. KiipFragment.setOnShowListener(android.content.DialogInterface.OnShowListener) or KiipFragmentCompat.setOnShowListener(android.content.DialogInterface.OnShowListener) should be used instead of setting a listener directly.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to use.

setOnDismissListener

public abstract void setOnDismissListener(android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener listener)
Sets a listener to be invoked when the Poptart is dismissed. KiipFragment.setOnDismissListener(android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener) or KiipFragmentCompat.setOnDismissListener(android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener) should be used instead of setting a listener directly.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to use.
